title: Display project data on a smashing dashboard
author: jason
readme:
This workflow will gather data every minute from the GitHub (<https://github.com>), Docker (<https://www.docker.com/>), npm (<https://www.npmjs.com/>) and Product Hunt (<https://www.producthunt.com/>) website APIs and display select information on a Smashing (<https://smashing.github.io/>) dashboard.

For convenience sake, the dashboard piece can be easily downloaded as a docker container (<https://hub.docker.com/r/tephlon/n8n_dashboard>) and installed into your docker environment.
readme_zh:
该工作流将每分钟从GitHub（<https://github.com>）、Docker（<https://www.docker.com/>）、npm（<https://www.npmjs.com/>）以及Product Hunt（<https://www.producthunt.com/>）的网站API收集数据，并在Smashing（<https://smashing.github.io/>）仪表板上展示选定信息。

为方便起见，仪表板组件可轻松以Docker容器（<https://hub.docker.com/r/tephlon/n8n_dashboard>）形式下载，并安装至您的Docker环境中。
title_zh: 在炫酷的仪表盘上展示项目数据
